attributes.title: CAUSES DEATH‼️
attributes.review:
My grandma downloaded this app to support the ✨🤮official Cheeto🤮✨that some delusional ppl call their “president”. But she forgot the fact that Trump support will not be tolerated in this household😌💅🏽. Let’s just say she’s not with us anymore😏🙄😳😵💀⚰️🔪💣🔫. 

P.S. Black Lives Matter✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿LGBTQ+ Lives Matter✨🏳️‍🌈& Stan Obama🦋💅🏽💕✨.

attributes.title: Im a supporter.  So why am i treated like this?
attributes.review: The app is breaking my iPhone!!!!!!!!!!! Crashes, slowing down, not opening, white screen, etc. It’s absolutely appalling. Apple, I will need you to fix this asap. I need to see his updates!!!!!! Trump 2020. 😉😉😉

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible
attributes.review: It’s the worst app that I’ve ever gotten in my life! It’s super slow and has force quit every time I try to open it! Most definitely don’t recommend 😡

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I open this app and instantly got rashes on my face. The I went to the doctor and they said it’s incurable and that I’ll end up orange the rest of my life. Don’t end up like me don’t download this app. It’s pure witchcraft

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Downloaded the app and was very disappointed. I already knew Trump was very racist, sexist, homophobic, and transphobic but looking at the app just made me 🤮. Would not recommend. Let’s vote in 2020 and not for this man who hates everyone except white men. 🧚🏽‍♂️✨

attributes.title: Disgusting orange fat man all over this app🤢
attributes.review: This app is j ✨terrible✨it’s slow, it glitches, it broke my phone! (Jk I never even opened it I j got it so I could write this review) this man is gross this app is gross and who ever gives it more than a one star is 🤢🤢🤢gross🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: ✨delete✨
attributes.review: This app is horrible , I don’t wanna see a orange on my screen , he is trying to delete tiktok NEVER !!!!, tiktok is my world✨ so back off delete this app Apple I will pay you 50 million trillion dollars :) thank you🖤

attributes.title: this app scared the heck out of me
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and it was just TERRIFYING everything about it, its inappropriate and i don’t believe content like this should be on the internet, remove immediately.

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever had on my phone
attributes.review: Very glitchy, took forever to download, and now my phone is slower than my grandad’s iPhone 4 when he’s trying to play candy crush.

attributes.title: SCARY🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🙈
attributes.review: This app terrified me the second i got onto it. I was expecting to see a good president! BUT WHAT I SAW??? A CHEETO. TERRIFYING!! I don’t know if this is some sort of joke! This is not funny!!! Also if your gonna get rid of our app just know we won’t go down without a fight ;)
